StarFighter

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • StarFighter.MovingThing
      • StarFighter.Ship
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Locatable

    public class Ship
extends MovingThing
    Extends MovingThing to create a Ship object to oppose the Alien object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor with spaces to fill in x and y coordinates and speed.
